name: LMMS Preset File
summary: Learn about .XPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create the XPF file, click the save icon in the "Default preset" window, name the file, choose your save location, and click Save.

You cannot open the XPF file by clicking on it, you must put it into the "presets" folder in your user directory. Then open the LMMS application, select the "My presets" star icon on the left side, navigate to your XPF file, and double-click it.

description: Preset file created by LMMS (Linux MultiMedia Studio), a music production program; contains instrument settings presets; includes instrument settings data like the project version, instrument track settings, instrument names, and effects.
